alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Terrebonne and central Lafourche Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chauvin, or 12 miles southeast of Houma, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Larose, Dulac, Montegut and Chauvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
